name: wildfire_agent_basic_eval
description: Basic evals for wildfire cost summary, trend comparison, and tool usage.

tests.description: Check that the agent aggregates 2024 wildfire costs and returns a table + insights.
tests.input: Give me a wildfire cost summary for 2024.
tests.expected_behavior: Agent loads mock data, aggregates costs by region and category, and returns a clear table with key insights.

tests.description: Check that the agent uses Google Search tool to compare costs with real-world trends.
tests.input: Give me a wildfire cost summary for 2024 and compare with recent real-world wildfire cost trends.
tests.expected_behavior: Agent summarizes 2024 synthetic costs, then calls google_search tool and explains high-level cost trends (e.g. climate change, billion-dollar disasters).

tests.description: Check that the agent can explain why aircraft is the dominant cost driver.
tests.input: Why are aircraft costs so high in this 2024 wildfire cost data?
tests.expected_behavior: Agent reasons about aircraft usage (long distances, flight hours, fuel, high hourly rates) based on aggregated data.
